name: iPhone Tripod Mount Adapter Universal Cell Phone Tripod Mount, Vertical Horizontal Adjustable Clamp 2.3~4.0" Wide
short_description: Better shots with dual flexible models: Items come with the cell phone tripod and mount adapter together, you can use them together or separately with different scenes, both of them are rotatable design, the tripod mount adapter also has three mount points, you can capture level shots on almost any surface, even wrap the flexible tripod legs around a lamp or tree. Sturdy construction and protection: With high quality engineering plastic it keeps lightweight and sturdy; Soft protective rubber and metal screw structure can hold and protect your phone; Metal ball and screw ensure a more durable and better lifetime even with frequently use; 3mm diameter pure aluminum material will keeps the three legs with better ductility and Load-bearing; Lightweight for a travel: The whole weight of cell phone tripod and mount adapter are just 128g , while the tripod is just 50g, you can put them into your bag integrally or individually as your needs. Various mount compatible: This cell phone tripod can also use for Video Slider, Ring Light, and Stabilizer. Also fits for most cell phone with or without a cased (width between 2.25inches-3inches ), such as iphone X, iPhone 7, 8, 7 plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s plus, iPhone 6, iphone SE/5s/5/5c,Samsung Galaxy S7/S6,Galaxy S7/S6 edge, Note 5/4/3, etc. Quality Guarantee: we offers a full 90 days 100% money back guarantee, so contact with us if you have problems.

name: Cass Creations Case for Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max, Dual Layer Shock Proof Bumper Protective Phone Cover - American Bald Eagle Flying with Flag
short_description: About this item Compatible Model: Apple iPhone 12 Pro Max Dual layer case provides shock absorbing protection, outer shell and a inner flexible layer offers extra protection if dropped The inner layer protection is a flexible TPU Case which wraps around and cover your phone to provide shock absorption The outer layer of protection is a hard plastic shell that covers the sides and back of the TPU Case Precise cutouts allow complete access to all ports, buttons, cameras and speakers
product_description: Dual layer case provides shock absorbing protection, outer shell and a inner flexible layer offers extra protection if dropped. The inner layer protection is a flexible TPU Case which wraps around and cover your phone to provide shock absorption. The outer layer of protection is a hard plastic shell that covers the sides and back of the TPU Case. Precise cutouts allow complete access to all ports, buttons, cameras and speakers.
